m_szDocTitle: Patent US7910249 - Additive for nonaqueous electrolyte and secondary battery using the same - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: Additive for nonaqueous electrolyte and secondary battery using the same US 7910249 B2 Abstract Disclosed is an electrolyte for a battery, which comprises: (a) an electrolyte salt; (b) a solvent for electrolyte; and (c) a compound represented by the following formula 1: wherein R is a halogen atom, or a halogen-substituted or non-substituted C1ËœC10 alkyl group or alkenyl group. An electrode comprising a passivation layer partially or totally formed on a surface thereof, wherein the passivation layer comprises a compound represented by the following Formula 1 or a chemical reaction product ther
